reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in the one bedroom Old Stable for 2 nights. To say it was perfect is an understatement. The house is delightful with a decent lounge/dining area downstairs with a loft main bedroom upstairs. The fridge was well stocked with local ingredients but I would highly recommend dining as often as possible at Matt & Lisa's restaurant next door. The staff were exceptionally lovely and the food was very good (and I tried a few of the well known restaurants in the area).
reviews.title: Perfect!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: The best break ever!
